CONGRESS_US = {

	USA_tax_break = {
		icon = passlaw
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = tax_break
			}
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = tax_break
			} 
		}
		cost = 25
		days_remove = 30
		days_re_enable = 180

		remove_effect = {
			add_timed_idea = {
			days = 180
			idea = tax_break
		}
		}
	}
	USA_subsidies = {
		icon = passlaw
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = industrial_subsidies
			}
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = industrial_subsidies
			} 
		}
		cost = 25
		days_remove = 30
		days_re_enable = 180
		
		remove_effect = {
			add_timed_idea = {
			days = 180
			idea = industrial_subsidies
		}
		}
	}
	The_Admission_of_Alaska_and_Hawaii = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = Admission_of_Alaska_and_Hawaii_vote
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				463 = { add_core_of = USA }
				629 = { add_core_of = USA }

			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					463 = { add_core_of = USA }
					629 = { add_core_of = USA }
					set_country_flag = ak_hi_state
					add_to_variable = { 
						senate_passing_value = 2
					}
					add_to_variable = { 
						senate_failing_value = 2
					}
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}
	The_Price_Anderson_Nuclear_Industries_Indemnity_Act = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = Price_Anderson_Nuclear_Industries_Indemnity_Act_vote
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				add_ideas = Price_Anderson_Nuclear_Industries_Indemnity_Act		
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					add_ideas = Price_Anderson_Nuclear_Industries_Indemnity_Act
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}
	Legislation_to_Ban_the_Sale_of_Switchblades = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = Ban_the_Sale_of_Switchblades_vote
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				add_ideas = Switchblades_Banned		
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					add_ideas = Narcotics_Manufacturing_Act
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}

	The_Mutual_Security_Act = {

		icon = generic_industry

	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = mutual_security_act
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_moderate_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				every_country = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								original_tag = COL
								original_tag = VEN
								original_tag = ECU
								original_tag = PRU
								original_tag = BRA
								original_tag = ARG
								original_tag = BOL
								original_tag = PAR
								original_tag = URG
								original_tag = CHL
							}
							NOT = { has_government = communism }
							NOT = { has_government = socialist }
							NOT = { has_government = maoism }
						}
								random_owned_controlled_state = {
										limit = {
												industrial_complex > 0
												free_building_slots = {
														building = industrial_complex
														size > 1
														include_locked = yes
													}
											}
										add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
										add_building_construction = {
												type = industrial_complex
												level = 2
												instant_build = yes
											}
									}
								random_owned_controlled_state = {
										limit = {
												industrial_complex > 0
												free_building_slots = {
														building = industrial_complex
														size > 1
														include_locked = yes
													}
											}
										add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
										add_building_construction = {
												type = industrial_complex
												level = 2
												instant_build = yes
											}
									}
					}
				} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
				every_country = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								original_tag = COL
								original_tag = VEN
								original_tag = ECU
								original_tag = PRU
								original_tag = BRA
								original_tag = ARG
								original_tag = BOL
								original_tag = PAR
								original_tag = URG
								original_tag = CHL
							}
							NOT = { has_government = communism }
							NOT = { has_government = socialist }
							NOT = { has_government = maoism }
						}
								random_owned_controlled_state = {
										limit = {
												industrial_complex > 0
												free_building_slots = {
														building = industrial_complex
														size > 1
														include_locked = yes
													}
											}
										add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
										add_building_construction = {
												type = industrial_complex
												level = 2
												instant_build = yes
											}
									}
								random_owned_controlled_state = {
										limit = {
												industrial_complex > 0
												free_building_slots = {
														building = industrial_complex
														size > 1
														include_locked = yes
													}
											}
										add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
										add_building_construction = {
												type = industrial_complex
												level = 2
												instant_build = yes
											}
									}
					}
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}
	Housing_Act_of_1949 = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = housing_act_o_1949
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				add_ideas = housing_act_1949		
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					add_ideas = housing_act_1949
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}

	McCarran_Walter_Act_Override = {


		available = {
			has_country_flag = McCarran_Walter_Act
		}
		visible = {
			has_country_flag = McCarran_Walter_Act
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 40

		activation = {
			has_country_flag = McCarran_Walter_Act
		}

		fixed_random_seed = no

		fire_only_once = yes

		is_good = no

		timeout_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 289  } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > 62 } 
					}
					news_event = { id = McCarran_Walter_Act.1 }
					add_political_power = -30
					add_ideas = McCarran_Walter_Act
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat < 290 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen < 63 } 
					}
					add_political_power = 100
					news_event = { id = McCarran_Walter_Act.2 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
							
		}
	}

	Agricultural_Act_of_1949 = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = agricultural_act_1949
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = agricultural_price_controls
					days = 2200
				}
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:agricultural_price_controls = 2200 }
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:agricultural_price_controls = global.num_days }
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = agricultural_price_controls
						days = 1200
					}
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:agricultural_price_controls = 1200 }
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:agricultural_price_controls = global.num_days }
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}
    Temporary_Tarrif_Hike_Act_Vote = {
            
        allowed = { tag = USA }
        ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
        
        available = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
        }
        visible = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = Temporary_Tarrif_Hike_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.55
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_gop_conservative_support = yes
                senate_progressive_dem_support = yes
                senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = Temporary_Tarrif_Hike_Act
					days = 2200
				}
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:Temporary_Tarrif_Hike_Act = 2200 }
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:Temporary_Tarrif_Hike_Act = global.num_days }
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    add_timed_idea = {
                        idea = Temporary_Tarrif_Hike_Act
                        days = 2200
                    }
                    set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:Temporary_Tarrif_Hike_Act = 2200 }
                    set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:Temporary_Tarrif_Hike_Act = global.num_days }
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
					add_tech_bonus = {
							name = agri_tech_bonus
							bonus = 1
							category = agriculture
						}
					}
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					add_tech_bonus = {
							name = agri_tech_bonus
							bonus = 1
							category = agriculture
						}
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}

		}

	The_National_Firearms_Act = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = National_Firearms_Act_vote
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				remove_ideas = National_Firearms_Act
				add_ideas =	National_Firearms_Act2	
			}
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					add_ideas =	National_Firearms_Act	
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}

	Renew_Agricultural_Subsidies_and_Price_Controls = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = Continue_Agricultural_Subsidies_Vote
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = agricultural_price_controls
					days = 1200
				}
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:agricultural_price_controls = 1200 }
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:agricultural_price_controls = global.num_days }
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = agricultural_price_controls
						days = 1200
					}
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:agricultural_price_controls = 1200 }
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:agricultural_price_controls = global.num_days }
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}

						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					random_owned_state = {
						add_building_construction = {
							type = air_base
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_state = {
						add_building_construction = {
							type = air_base
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_state = {
						add_building_construction = {
							type = air_base
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}
	The_Federal_Aviation_Act = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = Federal_Aviation_Act_vote
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				random_owned_state = {
					add_building_construction = {
						type = air_base
						level = 2
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					add_building_construction = {
						type = air_base
						level = 2
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					add_building_construction = {
						type = air_base
						level = 2
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					random_owned_state = {
						add_building_construction = {
							type = air_base
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_state = {
						add_building_construction = {
							type = air_base
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_state = {
						add_building_construction = {
							type = air_base
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}

					check_variable = { supseat < 218 } 
					check_variable = { supseat_sen < 50 } 
				}
				country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
			}
			set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
			set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
			
			clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
		}
	}

			}

					check_variable = { supseat > 217 } 
					check_variable = { supseat_sen > 49 } 
				}
				country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = economic_growth
					days = 900
				}
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:economic_growth = 900 }
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:economic_growth = global.num_days }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { supseat < 218 } 
					check_variable = { supseat_sen < 50 } 
				}
				country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
			}
			set_variable = { supseat = 0 }

					idea = tax_cuts
					days = 1825
				}
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:tax_cuts = 1825 }
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:tax_cuts = global.num_days }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { supseat < 218 } 
					check_variable = { supseat_sen < 50 } 
				}
				country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
			}
			set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
			set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
			
			clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
		}
	} 
	Gun_Control_Act = {

			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = Gun_Control_Act_vote
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_moderate_support = yes
				senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
			}
			add_political_power = 25
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { supseat > 217 } 
					check_variable = { supseat_sen > 49 } 
				}
				country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
				add_ideas = Gun_Control_Act
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { supseat < 218 } 
					check_variable = { supseat_sen < 50 }

	Consumer_Product_Safety_Act = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = Consumer_Product_Safety_Act_vote
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = enforce_Consumer_Protection_Laws
				}
				remove_ideas = enforce_Consumer_Protection_Laws
				add_ideas = strengthen_Consumer_Protection_Laws
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_idea = enforce_Consumer_Protection_Laws }
				}
				add_ideas = enforce_Consumer_Protection_Laws
			}
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { supseat > 217 } 
					check_variable = { supseat_sen > 49 } 
				}
				country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
				add_to_variable = { foreignPowerProjectionMonth = 150 }
				custom_effect_tooltip = increase_foreign_power_projection_monthly_150
				add_ideas = equal_pay_act
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { supseat < 218 } 
					check_variable = { supseat_sen < 50 } 
				}
				country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
			}
			set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
			set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
			
			clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
		}

	Metric_Conversion_Act = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = Metric_Conversion_Act_Vote
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = Metric_Conversion_Act_Vote
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				country_event = US_METRIC.1		
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					country_event = US_METRIC.1
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}

				add_political_power = 30
				capital_scope = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
					add_building_construction = {
						type = office_park
						level = 2
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					capital_scope = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
						add_building_construction = {
							type = office_park
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }

	Resource_Conservation_Act = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = Resource_Conservation_Act_Vote 
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				add_ideas = Resource_Conservation_Act_idea		
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					add_ideas = Resource_Conservation_Act_idea
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}

				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}
	Ethics_in_Government_Act = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = Ethics_in_Government_Act_Vote
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.55
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 50
				add_stability = 0.05		
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 50
					add_stability = 0.05	
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}

		allowed = { tag = USA }

				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
				senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_total_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = public_infrastructure_development
					days = 2250
				}
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:public_infrastructure_development = 2250 }
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:public_infrastructure_development = global.num_days }
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = public_infrastructure_development
						days = 2250
					}
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:public_infrastructure_development = 2250 }
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:public_infrastructure_development = global.num_days }
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}

				}
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:infrastructure_development = 2250 }
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:infrastructure_development = global.num_days }
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = infrastructure_development
						days = 2250
					}
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:infrastructure_development = 2250 }
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:infrastructure_development = global.num_days }
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}

		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.25
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				
				senate_gop_conservative_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = policy_welfare_temp_5
				}   
				add_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_4
				remove_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_5
			}			
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = policy_welfare_temp_4
				}   
				add_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_3
				remove_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_4
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = policy_welfare_temp_3
				}   
				add_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_2
				remove_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_3
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = policy_welfare_temp_2
				}   
				add_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_1
				remove_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_2
			}
			else = {
				remove_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_1
				add_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_0
			}	
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = policy_welfare_temp_5
				}   
				add_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_4
				remove_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_5
			}			
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = policy_welfare_temp_4
				}   
				add_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_3
				remove_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_4
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = policy_welfare_temp_3
				}   
				add_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_2
				remove_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_3
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = policy_welfare_temp_2
				}   
				add_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_1
				remove_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_2
			}
			else = {
				remove_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_1
				add_ideas = policy_welfare_temp_0
			}	
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
			}
		}
	}     

    Clean_Air_Act_1950s = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		   has_country_flag = Clean_Air_Act_Vote
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.52
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			#custom_effect_tooltip = will_vote
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_normal_dem_support = yes
                senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = gen_environmentalist_1
					days = 2250
				}
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:gen_environmentalist_1 = 2250 }
				set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:gen_environmentalist_1 = global.num_days }
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = gen_environmentalist_1
						days = 2250
					}
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:gen_environmentalist_1 = 2250 }
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:gen_environmentalist_1 = global.num_days }
				}
				if = {
                    OR = {
                        check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                    }
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
			}
		}
	}

    Fiscal_Responsibility_and_Economic_Stimulus_Act_Vote = {
            
        allowed = { tag = USA }
        ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
        
        available = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
        }
        visible = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = Fiscal_Responsibility_and_Economic_Stimulus_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.45
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_gop_moderate_support = yes
                senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                lower_tax_rate = yes
                add_timed_idea = {
                    idea = Fiscal_Responsibility_and_Economic_Stimulus_Act
                    days = 1460
                }
                set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:local_health_care = 1460 }
                set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:local_health_care = global.num_days }
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    add_timed_idea = {
                        idea = Fiscal_Responsibility_and_Economic_Stimulus_Act
                        days = 1460
                    }
                    set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:local_health_care = 1460 }
                    set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:local_health_care = global.num_days }
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.4
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			
			hidden_effect = {
				senate_moderate_dem_support = yes
				senate_gop_moderate_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				complete_national_focus = USA_FP80_Congressional_Approval
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
					complete_national_focus = USA_FP80_Congressional_Approval
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
					}
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }

				complete_national_focus = USA_FP80_The_Motion_Fails
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}

				add_political_power = 30
				add_ideas = Farm_Bill80
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
                    add_ideas = Farm_Bill80
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
					}
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}

			hidden_effect = {
                senate_normal_dem_support = yes
                senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
                senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
                senate_gop_moderate_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
                add_ideas = nasa
                increase_space_policy = yes
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
                    add_ideas = nasa
                    increase_space_policy = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
					}
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}

		}

    Federal_Reserve_Act_of_1989_Vote = {
	
		allowed = { tag = USA }
		ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		}
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
		    has_country_flag = Federal_Reserve_Act_of_1989_Vote
		}
		cost = 50
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_variable = {					
				bipartisan_value = 0.40
			}	
			set_country_flag = law_passing
			bipartisan_house_calc = yes
			
			hidden_effect = {
                senate_normal_dem_support = yes
                senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
                senate_gop_moderate_support = yes
			}
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 30
                remove_ideas = Repealed_Federal_Reserve
				step_towards_planned = yes
			} 			
		}
		days_remove = 50
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
						check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
					}
					country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
					add_political_power = 30
                    remove_ideas = Repealed_Federal_Reserve
					step_towards_planned = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
					}
					country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
				}
				set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
				set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
				
				clr_country_flag = law_passing
				clear_support_types = yes
			}
		}
	}

                add_political_power = 30
                decrease_women_policy = yes
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    decrease_women_policy = yes
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    Decrease_Farm_Crisis = yes
                    add_ideas = Farmer_Support_Act
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

        visible = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = Mandatory_Congressional_Regulatory_Oversight_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.6
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
                senate_gop_total_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                add_ideas = Mandatory_Congressional_Regulatory_Review_Act
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    add_ideas = Mandatory_Congressional_Regulatory_Review_Act
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

    Law_Enforcement_Financing_Act_Vote = {
        
        allowed = { tag = USA }
        ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
        
        available = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
        }
        visible = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = Law_Enforcement_Financing_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.6
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_gop_total_support = yes
                senate_moderate_dem_support = yes
                senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                increase_cpi_policy = yes
                decrease_crime_crisis = yes
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    increase_cpi_policy = yes
                    decrease_crime_crisis = yes
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

        visible = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = Womens_Educational_and_Economic_Advancement_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.55
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
                senate_normal_dem_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                add_ideas = Womens_Educational_and_Economic_Advancement_Act
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    add_ideas = Womens_Educational_and_Economic_Advancement_Act
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

            hidden_effect = {
                senate_gop_total_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                add_ideas = Geoengineering_Research_Act
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    add_ideas = Geoengineering_Research_Act
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.55
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_progressive_dem_support = yes
                senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
                senate_moderate_dem_support = yes
                senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                add_ideas = American_Infrastructure_Reconstruction_Act
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    add_ideas = American_Infrastructure_Reconstruction_Act
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }

    Corporate_Fair_Tax_Act_Vote = {
        
        allowed = { tag = USA }
        ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
        
        available = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
        }
        visible = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = Corporate_Fair_Tax_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.4
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_progressive_dem_support = yes
                senate_moderate_dem_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                increase_tax_rate = yes
                increase_tax_rate = yes
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    increase_tax_rate = yes
                    increase_tax_rate = yes
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

    OSHA_Abolition_Act_Vote = {
        
        allowed = { tag = USA }
        ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
        
        available = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
        }
        visible = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = OSHA_Abolition_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.4
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
                senate_gop_conservative_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                remove_ideas = safety_regulations
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    remove_ideas = safety_regulations
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

                add_political_power = 30
                increase_union_policy = yes
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    increase_union_policy = yes
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = Clean_Energy_Promotion_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.55
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_normal_dem_support = yes
                senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                decrease_pollution_crisis = yes
                add_ideas = Clean_Energy_Promotion_Act
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    decrease_pollution_crisis = yes
                    add_ideas = Clean_Energy_Promotion_Act
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

                step_towards_planned = yes
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    step_towards_planned = yes
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
        }
        visible = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = Income_Tax_Restructuring_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.45
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_gop_moderate_support = yes
                senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
                senate_gop_conservative_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                lower_tax_rate = yes
                lower_tax_rate = yes
                decrease_upper_middle_tax_rate = yes
                decrease_upper_middle_tax_rate = yes
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    lower_tax_rate = yes
                    lower_tax_rate = yes
                    decrease_upper_middle_tax_rate = yes
                    decrease_upper_middle_tax_rate = yes
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

    Aid_to_Families_with_Dependent_Children_Devolution_Act_Vote = {
            
        allowed = { tag = USA }
        ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
        
        available = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
        }
        visible = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = Aid_to_Families_with_Dependent_Children_Devolution_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.45
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_gop_conservative_support = yes
                senate_gop_moderate_support = yes
                senate_dixiecrat_dem_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                reduce_welfare_rate = yes
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    reduce_welfare_rate = yes
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    increase_healthcare_rate = yes
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.55
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_progressive_dem_support = yes
                senate_moderate_dem_support = yes
                senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                add_ideas = Water_Resources_Modernization_Act
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    add_ideas = Water_Resources_Modernization_Act
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

        allowed = { tag = USA }
        ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
        
        available = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
        }
        visible = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = Infrastructure_Investment_Program_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50
        fire_only_once = yes
        
        complete_effect = {
            set_variable = {					
                bipartisan_value = 0.55
            }	
            set_country_flag = law_passing
            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_normal_dem_support = yes
                senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                add_timed_idea = {
                    idea = infrastructure_development
                    days = 2250
                }
                set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:infrastructure_development = 2250 }
                set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:infrastructure_development = global.num_days }
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = infrastructure_development
						days = 2250
					}
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:infrastructure_development = 2250 }
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:infrastructure_development = global.num_days }
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }

            bipartisan_house_calc = yes
            
            hidden_effect = {
                senate_normal_dem_support = yes
                senate_gop_liberal_support = yes
            }
            
            effect_tooltip = {
                add_political_power = 30
                decrease_crime_crisis = yes
                add_timed_idea = {
                    idea = Urban_Revitilization_Act
                    days = 2250
                }
                set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:Urban_Revitilization_Act = 2250 }
                set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:Urban_Revitilization_Act = global.num_days }
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
                    decrease_crime_crisis = yes
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = Urban_Revitilization_Act
						days = 2250
					}
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_len_@token:Urban_Revitilization_Act = 2250 }
					set_variable = { THIS.idea_date_@token:Urban_Revitilization_Act = global.num_days }
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }
                
                clr_country_flag = law_passing
                clear_support_types = yes
            }
        }
    }

        allowed = { tag = USA }
        ai_will_do = { factor = 10 }
        
        available = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
        }
        visible = {
            NOT = { has_country_flag = law_passing }
            has_country_flag = Comprehensive_Anti_Apartheid_Act_Vote
        }
        cost = 50

                senate_gop_moderate_support = yes
            }

                add_political_power = 30
                complete_national_focus = USA_FP84_The_Passage_of_the_Act
            } 			
        }
        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    country_event = { id = us_congress.100 }
                    add_political_power = 30
					complete_national_focus = USA_FP84_The_Passage_of_the_Act
                }
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {
                            check_variable = { supseat < 217 } 
                            check_variable = { supseat_sen < senate_failing_value  } 
                        }
                    }
					complete_national_focus = USA_FP84_Failure_of_the_Act
                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
                }
                set_variable = { supseat = 0 }
                set_variable = { supseat_sen = 0 }

                    }
                }
                370 = {

                    }
                }
            }

        days_remove = 50
        remove_effect = {
            hidden_effect = {
                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        check_variable = { supseat > 216 } 
                        check_variable = { supseat_sen > senate_passing_value } 
                    }
                    custom_effect_tooltip = enforced_voting_access_TT

                        focus_adjustment_USA = 0.01
                    }

                        }

                            unique_state_adjustment = 0.025
                        }
                    }

                if = {
                    limit = { 
                        OR = {

                        }

                    country_event = { id = parliament.1 }
